title: Bug 124570 - Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
description: Bug 124570Preview from toolbar always shows first report opened in session
OB: When testing BIRT 2.0 RC2, I encountered an issue with the Web Viewer's Preview feature from the toolbar. It consistently displays only the first report I opened in a session.
EB: Currently, the Preview feature in the Web Viewer is not functioning correctly as it always shows the first report opened in a session instead of the selected report.
SR: To resolve this bug, the Preview feature should display the selected report instead of always defaulting to the first one opened in the session.
